jcurses.event
Class ItemEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jcurses.event.Event
        |
        +--jcurses.event.ItemEvent
public class ItemEvent
extends Event

Instances of this class are generated by widgets, that manage a list of items, an example is list widget.

Constructor Detail

ItemEvent

public ItemEvent(Widget source,
                 int id,
                 java.lang.Object item,
                 int type)
The constructor
Parameters:
source - the widget, that has generated this event
id - the id of the affected item
item - the content of the affected item, in order this is a string.
type - the type of the event, must be equal to one of following three constants:
SELECTED - the event signals, that an item is selected by the user
DESELECTED - the event signals, that an item is deselected by the user
CALLED - the event signals, that an item is 'called' by the user, this is in order activated with the cursor an pushed 'enter' key
Method Detail

getId

public int getId()
Returns:
the id (key) of the affected item

getType

public int getType()
Returns:
the type of the event. Only possible values: SELECTED,DESELECTED,CALLED

getItem

public java.lang.Object getItem()
Returns:
the content of the affected item
